# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: write a copy for a corporate social media account announcing three events 3DLOOK will be participating in in March, invitating to come and say hi!

the events:

'Retail Shakeup: How AI is driving growth in Fashion Retail'. March 7 in New York, NY
SXSW 2023. March 10–19 in Austin, TX
Shoptalk. March 26-29 in Las Vegas

Відповідь: , NV

Hey everyone! 

We’re excited to announce that we’ll be participating in three exciting events in March! First up is Retail Shakeup: How AI is driving growth in Fashion Retail in New York on March 7. Next is SXSW 2023 in Austin between March 10 and 19. And finally, we’ll be at Shoptalk in Las Vegas from March 26 to 29. 

If you’re in the area, come by and say hi! We’re looking forward to meeting all of you and learning all we can while we’re out at these events. See you there! #3DLOOK #RetailShakeup #SXSW2023 #Shoptalk
